A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining with amazing moments and maybe some of the coolest things that you’ve seen yet in a Star Wars movie. Weighed down by some serious plot holes and cheap plot devices that feel unneeded and in some ways leaves you with unsatisfying answers or more questions than you had before. I don’t understand people who think the prequels were better or say this is the worst Star Wars film because the highs were some of the best moments in the franchise but the lows keep it from reaching the same level of enjoyment I got from the original trilogy or even The Force Awakens or or Rogue One.
